import React from "react"; import { heart, filled_heart } from "../../../assets/index"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const CardInfo = ({ id, brand, model, cost, materials, technology, generalHeight, soleHeight, fastener, color, sex, }) => { const { favorites } = useSelector((state) => state.auth.data); return (

{model}

{brand}

{cost}

$

Materials :

  • {materials}

Color :

  • {color}

Fastener :

  • {fastener}

Technology :

  • {technology}

Height :

  • Sole heigth: {soleHeight}
); }; export default CardInfo;
